item.title: Theming/styling error messages in Symfony 2
item.description: I spent a large portion of my day today trying to customize the HTML produced by Symfony 2 for form errors. The documentation has a section on how to do this, but for the life of me, I could not make it work. Here is a working, re-usable solution, with a brief explanation of the mistake I made at the end.
